comment: Omnipoll voting results have not been published and only two suggestions were sketched.

data.suggestion: Mike & Evals, getting some time together on Christmas Eve, just watching the snow fall and exchange presents as lifelong friends.
Kat is stripping clothes from dolls of her friends. Unbeknownst to her, this is compelling her real friends in the Oasis Room to get naked.
Bastian Nora
MistleNO! Nora catches Trace under the mistletoe! Tis the season right?
Chalchiuhtlicue, Calamity from No Evil
Eric the new Grand Templar
Frankenstein's monster helps trace and flora with the Christmas decorations
Nibbly’s thoughts on sythe and maren
Remake of Kathrin and Flora pressed together
Raine lingerie follow up Raine is in such a hurry back to her room that she runs right into Red around the corner, knocking him over and landing on top of him.
Flora eating all of the Christmas treats because of her pregnancy hunger/cravings
Sequel of "Wedding Nightmares": Maren sighs in relief "it was just a dream" Then she turns her head and sees Sythe. Maren wakes up screaming again.
Mike finds Eric's secret whiskey loaded christmas pudding and falls overboard
A Riftwall Christmas: Maeve and her cousins watch hungerly as Adira and Amelia put the finishing touches on the Riftwall family christmas dinner.
Human Reni in fur-trimmed winter wear
Flora costumed as Leeloo from Fifth Element, with Trace as Corbin Dallas.
Adira and Maeve opening presents on christmas
Laura (as the ghost of Christmas Yet to Come), trying to convince Keith (as Scrooge) to change his miserly ways for Christmas-time.
Trace being sultry for Flora in the bedroom. Open robe, rose, candles, the whole shebang. Flora likes very much!
Step by step transformation lapse of Raine from human to wolf
Kat & Mike's mistletoe kiss fully illustrated. (Mistletoe mistake 2 cont.)
Evals sister Erilas returns for Christmas and wants to sit on Santa Mike's lap and tell him all the naughty stuff she resisted doing that year.
firework show. gunpowder vs mana based fireworks
Flora Claus delivering Trace’s present
What if Laura was Grand Templar instead of Trace?
During a snowy night time walk about, Zen and Raine stop to take a selfie with a scenic view looking out over a brightly lit city.
Heart’s Desire: Roselyn After learning of Natani’s Heart’s Desire curse, Roselyn hesitantly asks to receive the curse.
Mike receives the first gift of his life from Evals (while they were slaves.)
Clovis and Brutus go clothes shopping
Christmas: Maddie and Maeve roll an "ecstatic" Keith into a snowman. Natani is amused.
Saria gets a Tiger Trace slave boy for Christmas
Nib Nab 3: Oasis Edition
Legosi and Haru meet Trace and Flora exchanging romance tips
Our (realtively) intrepid explorers find themselves in a savanna surrounded by a tribe of cheetah keidran armed with pointy spears!
Rose puts up the Magic Mistletoe trying to get Saria but gets Trace instead.
Gingerbread manor! Everyone pitches in to build a gingerbread house that looks like Traces manor. It turns out "a bit" bigger than expected
A sequel to Lingerie Proposal
A studious Red invents a new tail tugging spell. He manages to tug the tails of cat Nora, cat Reni and cat Maren simultaneously.
Reni's first Christmas. Young Reni and young Trace play together in front of the Christmas tree, as Nora watches over them.
Smug Karen
Kei kiss Reni under mistletoe. It's just platonic kiss, but it still making her blush
Sythe in regalia providing diplomatic relations "advice" to the Basitin trio. Lynn is studiously taking notes, but the other two are more suspicious.
Flora receives tons of presents from everyone, but turns out the presents are all items to help with the baby. Flora is not amused by this.
A Husky Keidran in a wintry forest.
Nora shows off her magic mistletoe collection, her favorite being illuminated in a glass case
A dog sled, pulled by keidranified Red and Raine as lead dogs, and Sythe and Zen as wheelers, all driven by a manically laughing Maren as musher.
Maren becomes a beauty Youtuber
Good Morning Flora, Kat version
Adira and Maeve building a messy gingerbread house of the tavern.
Festive Flora baby bump!
Pole Dancing Mike wearing a Santa Hat
Candle-lit dinner with Sythe and CatMaren (like scene from “Magical Mishaps” page 15 frame 1)
A TK version of the National Lampoons Christmas Vacation poster but with Kat and her fur is now poofed out from the shock
Human Reni in a mall, asking Santa for some magical artifacts.
Steampunk Nora
Keith and Natani find a quiet spot during a Christmas party to exchange gifts and kisses
Adult Maddie and Maeve in Christmas Outfits.
Eric tries out being an art critic, critiquing paintings with many vague, technical terms. Kat is impressed, but nobody else is entirely convinced.
Trace playfully tying a bow around Flora's pregnant belly. “Won't be much longer until our present arrives.”
Remake of "Flora and Slavegirl bathing"
A young Raine receives a little stuffed wolf on Christmas. The tag only reads: From “Father” Christmas.
Flora stomps on the Magic Mistletoe for always backfiring. Trace walks in moments later to find an angry Flora with her foot now stuck in her mouth.
Chimera enjoys her first Christmas.
A christmas truce just as there was during WW1 in our world.
Maeve sitting in Adira's lap and they're hugging each other on a couch near an open fire.
Trace and flora on a christmas double date with Nanati and Keith
Eric teaches Kat how to paint (Fem Mike is the one being painted and isn't happy)
An older, grizzled Keith drinking away his sorrows at a tavern/bar, crying about how he couldn't save Alaric or Laura and now Natani.
Trace, Flora, and Kathrin meeting Fluff Kevlar's Ara
Ghost Laura catches Keith under the enchanted mistletoe leading to ghostly kisses
Sythe kisses Maren under a mistletoe while saying: "merry christmas, you filthy animal" referencing himself.
Flora in a bubble bath trying to convince trace to join her
The cast as the Fellowship of the Ring.
Nora holds the enchanted mistletoe over Kei and human Reni
The main 4 together enjoying the holidays.
Adira, Amelia and Maeve host their special holiday party in Riftwall for all their patrons
3rd part of Mistletoe Kathrin. She tries to us it on Eric, only to fail and kisses trace
Young Adira and Amelia hold hands as they step through the rift wall for the first time.
Sittin’ Pretty Kathrin Redraw
Trace wearing a Santa hat and Flora playing with the white puff in the end. Swatting it around like a house cat.
Cute Kat in socks
"Tribal Flora" Redraw.
A Battle Royale of female Keidrans, Fighting each other over who will be with Mike. Mike is off to the side tied up with a sign that says, "To the Winner!"
Magical Boy Keith spreading xmas cheer to all the good boys and girls
Wolf Raine as the "Grey Ghost" Enterprise from Game/Anime "Azure Lane"
